longDescription:
Near Greektown Casino: This business-friendly Detroit hotel is close to Campus Martius Park, the Detroit Opera House, Greektown Casino, and Ford Field.

Meeting and event space:

Atheneum Suite Hotel provides 29,000 square feet (2694 square meters) of meeting space, state-of-the-art audiovisual and video-conferencing equipment, and event catering options.

Complimentary Wi-Fi: All 174 suites feature city views, complimentary wireless Internet access, 42-inch LCD TVs, in-room safes, dual-line phones with voicemail, and coffeemakers. Marble bathrooms have deep soaking tubs.

Rooms
Atheneum Suite Hotel offers 174 two-room suites. 42-inch LCD televisions come with satellite channels and pay movies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is provided along with dual-line phones, complimentary newspapers, and laptop-compatible in-room safes. Coffee/tea makers and minibars are provided. Marble bathrooms include hair dryers. Clock radios with MP3 docks are also included. All guestrooms are non-smoking.

Dining
Fishboneâ€™s Rhythm Cafe - Authentic New Orleans cuisine, including fresh fish and prime steaks. The Atheneum Suite Hotel offers 24-hour room service.

Fees

  • The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.
    • Breakfast fee: between USD 7 and USD 13 per person (approximately)
    • Valet parking fee: USD 25.00 per day (in/out privileges)
  • The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

Location Highlights

  • Metro station nearby
  • In entertainment district

Property Amenities
Atheneum Suite Hotel offers a 24-hour business center with 29,000 square feet (2694 square meters) of meeting facilities, including a ballroon, 12 conference rooms, audio-visual equipment, translation services, and banquet facilities. Wireless Internet access is complimentary in public areas. This 4.0-star property offers a health club, fitness facilities, concierge services, and multilingual staff. Atheneum Suite Hotel is a smoke-free property.

  • MP3 docking station
  • Room service (24 hours)
  • LCD TV

Recreation
Recreational amenities at the hotel include a health club.

The closest major airports to Atheneum Suite Hotel are:Windsor, ON (YQG) - 9.6 km / 6 miDetroit, MI (DTW-Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County) - 28.1 km / 17.4 miThe preferred airport for Atheneum Suite Hotel is Detroit, MI (DTW-Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County). Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

Policies

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum check-in age is 21
  • Check-out time is noon
  • Check-in time starts at 3 PM
  • Pets not allowed

  • JCB International
  • MasterCard

hotelMandatoryFeesText.name: Mandatory Fees and Taxes
hotelMandatoryFeesText.content:
• You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the hotel:
    • Deposit: USD 50.00 per day
  • We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.

hotelRenovationText.name: Renovations and Closures
hotelRenovationText.content:
The property is undergoing renovations. The following areas are affected:

  • Elevator
  • Front desk
  • Lobby

Renovation work will only be conducted during business hours. Every effort will be made to minimize noise and disturbance.
